Package colorguard

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • colorguard.GameWindow

  • public class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    GameWindow is the GUI of Colorguard. It has a JFrame which contains 3 components: BoardPanel which holds the 20 by 21 grid of the board, PowerupPanel which stores upto 4 Powerups for each team, MessagePane which shows messages to the user
    Author:
    amaytripathi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameWindow​()
      Creates a new GameWindow with components of default sizes.

      • promptUser

        public void promptUser​(java.util.HashSet<Location> validLocs)
        Prompts the user to click a valid location. Updates buttons at validLocs to be highlighted.
        Parameters:
        validLocs - a HashSet containing a list of Locations to set as valid

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Adds given message to the messagePane. Resizes if needed.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be added

      • updateSquare

        public void updateSquare​(Location loc,
                         GameBoard board)
        Updates the icon square at given Location of the board.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location of the square to update
        board - the GameBoard to use

      • updateBoard

        public void updateBoard​(Colorguard game)
        Updates the GUI for the given board
        Parameters:
        game - the current state of the game to use

      • getLastValidLocation

        public Location getLastValidLocation​()
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Gets the last valid Location clicked by the user. Waits until notifyThread() is called before acting. Unhighlights all spots after action is complete
        Returns:
        the last valid Location clicked by user
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • notifyThread

        public void notifyThread​()
        Helper method for managing threads. Resumes all threads for this class.

        Resizes given icon to new width and height
